title: Institutional Space & Resource Management Platform (Capstone Project)
description: A full-stack platform for managing campus spaces, room and locker reservations, and user communication. Features include real-time chat via WebSocket, secure JWT authentication, and admin dashboards for analytics and scheduling.

title: News AI – Live AI-Powered News Aggregation Platform
description: A production-deployed Spring Boot application that aggregates news from 5+ APIs, summarizes articles using Gemini AI, and delivers curated daily briefings via email. The backend is self-hosted on an Android device and exposed globally using Cloudflare Tunnel with a custom HTTPS domain, without using cloud VMs or static IPs.

title: Movie Explorer – OMDb + Gemini AI
description: AI-integrated web application that fetches movie details via the OMDb API and generates personalized movie recommendations using Gemini AI.

title: Full-Stack Retail Management System
description: A full-stack retail management system built with Spring Boot and Angular, featuring JWT authentication, role-based access, and database-backed inventory management.

title: Gateway API Application
description: Spring Boot API Gateway service that routes and proxies requests to multiple microservices while serving an Angular-based front-end.

title: CampusConnect – Student Companion iOS App
description: An iOS application enabling students to manage events, navigate campus maps, join study groups, and plan academic schedules.

title: Police Entity Microservice
description: A RESTful Spring Boot microservice managing police entity data with layered architecture, secure CRUD operations, and H2 persistence.

title: Plushie Item Microservice
description: Spring Boot microservice for managing plushie inventory with clean service-repository separation and RESTful CRUD endpoints.

title: Spring Boot Book Review App
description: A web application for managing and reviewing books with user authentication and server-side rendering.

title: Multiplayer Blackjack Game
description: A real-time multiplayer blackjack game featuring deck management, turn-based gameplay, and socket-based communication.

title: ShapeAnimator
description: An interactive WPF application with animated shapes, collision detection, shooting mechanics, and power-ups.

title: Chess Clone
description: A two-player chess game implementing core movement rules and turn-based gameplay in the browser.
